channel.title: Covering
channel.description:
Starting to cover a lot of songs on acoustic . Almost finished with buying all my equipment, then I'm making a YouTube channel. Got some questions.
1. I need a cool name (I know I'll get flame but hopefully someone Will help me)
2. Please suggest good [b]acoustic[/b] songs to cover. Thanks

item.title: Covering
item.dc:creator: @Dunder_Mifflin1 Dunder Mifflin
item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:4, topic:438310”]Eagle poop

as for songs…
Green day - Time of your Life
Weezer - Island in the Sun
Pink Floyd - Wish You Were Here
Beatles - Here Comes the Sun
Eric Clapton - Tears in Heaven
3 Doors down - Kryptonite
Blind Melon - No Rain
Rolling Stones - Paint it Black
Led Zeppelin - D’yer Mak’er

And just remember…
“Any song that doesn’t sound good on a acoustic guitar is not a good song” - Paul Stanley, KISS[/quote]

Just learned the three songs I bolded. They are very nice haha. Thanks!

Read full topic

Starting to cover a lot of songs on acoustic . Almost finished with buying all my equipment, then I’m making a YouTube channel. Got some questions.

    [/quote]
    Oh you are that pornstarscape asshole
    so I suggest
    Assholewithaguitar101
    and
    cover rebecca black friday[/quote]

Lol it was an April fools and thanks I’ll take that information into consideration. <3
